word:
It is the cry of many mothers: "I have no time to be with my children." Then for Christ's sake spend less 
                                                                           192
time on your dress. Neglect if you will to adorn your apparel. Neglect to receive and make calls. Neglect to cook an endless variety of dishes. But never, never neglect your children. What is the chaff to the wheat? Let nothing interpose between you and the best interests of your children.
